bio:
Argi Farseer is an old Nord woman who lives in Stonehills. Argi's sister is the ruler of Hjaalmarch, Jarl Idgrod Ravencrone. Argi has shoulder-length blonde hair, unlike the dark hair of her sister Idgrod. Argi spends most of her time at home. Stonehills is a small iron mining settlement located directly east of Morthal. Stonehills is based outside of Rockwallow Mine, which is owned by Thane Bryling of Solitude. Stonehills is completely self-sufficient, and its people take responsibility for their own well-being. A Nord man named Pactur co-manages the Rockwallow Mine with his wife Sorli. Pactur and Sorli have a young adult son named Sirgar, and they have been training Sirgar to be able to manage the mine after they retire.
Argi's sister Idrgod is married to a Nord man named Aslfur, who also serves as her Idgrod's steward. Idgrod and Aslfur have an young adult daughter named Idgrod the Younger, as well as a young son named Joric.
name: Argi Farseer
